entry.title: Computer Vision and NLP for Multi-Task Fashion Attrb. Modeling
entry.summary:
Description

Combining Computer Vision and NLP for Multi-Task Fashion Attribute Modeling at Shoprunner

Generating fashion attributes of products is key for allowing search and filtering in online retail. To automatically generate attribute tags for millions of products the Shoprunner Data Science team built an ensemble of custom multi-task CNNs and fine-tuned Googleâ€™s Bert in Pytorch.
